CWE-79.title: Prevent XSS
CWE-79.implementation: Use context-sensitive output encoding and Content-Security-Policy

CWE-89.title: Prevent SQL Injection
CWE-89.implementation: Use parameterized queries or prepared statements

CWE-78.title: Prevent Command Injection
CWE-78.implementation: Validate and sanitize inputs, use allowlists for permitted commands

CWE-287.title: Strengthen Authentication
CWE-287.implementation: Implement multi-factor authentication and secure session management

CWE-20.title: Improve Input Validation
CWE-20.implementation: Validate all input data against defined schemas and enforce strict type checking

CWE-22.title: Prevent Path Traversal
CWE-22.implementation: Validate and sanitize file paths, use path canonicalization

CWE-352.title: Prevent CSRF
CWE-352.implementation: Use anti-CSRF tokens and validate origin/referer headers

CWE-434.title: Secure File Upload
CWE-434.implementation: Validate file types, scan for malware, restrict file permissions

CWE-798.title: Remove Hardcoded Credentials
CWE-798.implementation: Use environment variables, config files, or secure credential stores

CWE-306.title: Implement Authentication
CWE-306.description: Add missing authentication for critical functions
CWE-306.implementation: Require proper authentication before accessing sensitive operations

CWE-601.title: Prevent Open Redirect
CWE-601.implementation: Validate redirect URLs against allowlist or use indirect reference maps
